name: The Maze (James Bryan)
description:
This is not the full game but only a 5 level version. If it does well i will go ahead with building the full game. Please leave your feedback and ratings!!!
The game is controlled by tilting your phone , this is me taking advantage and utilizing the phones accelerometer.
This game was made for a college project, the music in the app is copyright free and everything in the game is made by myself.
